lyrics.stanza: Jesus Lord, You're our first love; You're the One we love the best. When our heart is loving You, How we're filled with Your sweet rest!
Lord, we love You for Yourself, Not for what You give or do. Nothing else could e'er compare With the joy of loving You.
Never more could we desire Anything that's less than You, And to this we would aspire— Simply to be filled with You.
Jesus Lord, You're our first love; You're the One we love the best. When our heart is loving You, How we're filled with Your sweet rest!
